books.title: Mansfield Park
books.author: Jane Austen
books.summary: A young girl is sent to live with her wealthy relatives at a country estate, where she must navigate adolescence and young adulthood.

books.title: The Lost World
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.summary: A team of scientists and adventurers explores a prehistoric land.

books.title: Struggles and Triumphs
books.author: P. T. Barnum
books.summary: The world’s greatest showman tells the story of his life.

books.title: The Lives and Opinions of Eminent Philosophers
books.author: Diogenes Laërtius
books.summary: Brief biographies of the prominent philosophers of ancient Greece.

books.title: Old Indian Legends
books.author: Zitkála-Šá
books.summary: A collection of Dakota legends retold by Zitkála-Šá.

books.title: The Surprising Adventures of Baron Munchausen
books.author: Rudolph Erich Raspe
books.summary: The legendary Baron Munchausen’s tall tales of wonder and adventure.

books.title: Timon of Athens
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A wealthy Athenian lord becomes poor and friendless after his “friends” take advantage of his hospitality.

books.title: The Surprising Adventures of Baron Munchausen
books.author: Rudolph Erich Raspe
books.summary: The legendary Baron Munchausen’s tall tales of wonder and adventure.

books.title: Blue Hand
books.author: Edgar Wallace
books.summary: A law clerk takes an interest in the disappearance of a well-known woman and her infant daughter, just as their fortune is about to be distributed to a notorious client.

books.title: Frankenstein
books.author: Mary Shelley
books.summary: A tragic scientist creates a monster in his laboratory.

books.title: The House of the Dead
books.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
books.summary: A ex-convict in 19th-century Russia reminisces on his experiences in a Siberian prison.

books.title: The Mystery of a Hansom Cab
books.author: Fergus Hume
books.summary: A man is found dead in a hansom cab in the city of Melbourne, Australia, and a young man is accused of his murder.

books.title: The Rough Riders
books.author: Theodore Roosevelt
books.summary: The First United States Volunteer Cavalry fights in the Spanish–American War.

books.title: The Age of Reason
books.author: Thomas Paine
books.summary: Paine argues against the legitimacy of the Bible and institutional religion.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Wilfred Owen
books.summary: A collection of Wilfred Owen’s published poems.

books.title: Sartor Resartus
books.author: Thomas Carlyle
books.summary: The meta-fictional commentary on the life of “famous” German philosopher Diogenes Teufelsdröckh and his Philosophy of Clothes.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Algis Budrys
books.summary: Science fiction short stories by author Algis Budrys.

books.title: Allan Quatermain Stories
books.author: H. Rider Haggard
books.summary: A collection of short stories about a legendary hunter.

books.title: Demian
books.author: Hermann Hesse
books.summary: A boy goes on a journey of spiritual growth.

books.title: The Cruise of the Alerte
books.author: E. F. Knight
books.summary: An English journalist sets sail in search of treasure buried on a remote desert island.
